page.title: 01Home Life
page.content:
I Live in gladstone house at number five my friend michelle lives at number one gladstone house. sometimes we knock for each other and play in the corridor but sometimes I am not alowd out in the corridor but when I am my friend is on her bike. {sharon nichols}
I live at Sadler close mitcham surry and my block is called chart and my door number is number 1 the block number goes upto number 8.The flats were built in 1975 and me and my mum and dad and sister were the first ones to live in chart block and since we lived there our caretaker Brian was still there but then he left and went to an old peoples home and now weve got a new caretacker {Brenda Gualdino
